properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , NVL(REPLY_NO, '-') REPLY_NO , REPORTING_MEM , REPORTED_MEM , REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG FROM REPORTED ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
